name: Hungry Tiger
description:
Hungry Tiger game is an exciting physics-based puzzle game in which your task is to deliver a piece of meat to a hungry tiger by breaking the chains in the right order and at the right moment.
At the beginning of each level you will see a piece of meat hanging on chains. Your task is to break these chains so that the meat falls in the right place and reaches the tiger. But it's not as easy as it seems! You should carefully study the mechanism of the chains and their relationship to understand in what order they need to be broken.
The game contains many levels, each of which becomes more and more difficult. You will face various obstacles that may prevent you from bringing meat to the tiger.
